title: United Nations Pledging Conference for Development Activities
text:
United Nations 
A/80/L.37
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
10 December 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-20310 (E)    121225 
*2520310* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Agenda item 23 
Operational activities for development 
 
 
 
 
 
Draft decision submitted by the President of the General Assembly* 
 
 
 
 United Nations Pledging Conference for Development Activities 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, recalling its decision 75/511 B of 9 September 2021, by 
which it decided to adjust the scope of the United Nations Pledging Conference for 
Development Activities and to hold the Conference on an annual basis shortly after 
the operational activities for development segment of the Economic and Social 
Council session, and taking into account the letter dated 8 December 2025 from the 
Under-Secretary-General for Economic and Social Affairs addressed to the President 
of the General Assembly, decides to convene the next Pledging Conference for 
Development Activities in 2027. 
 
 
 
* In order for the General Assembly to take action on the present proposal, it will be necessary to 
decide to reopen consideration of agenda item 23 and to consider it directly in plenary meeting.
